text: Hoda Kotb returned to her second home Monday morning. Kotb joined Savannah Guthrie and Matt Lauer on ` ` Today'' for the first time since announcing on Feb. 21 that she had adopted a daughter, Haley Joy Kotb. ` ` It's everything,'' she said of motherhood. Kotb added that she would regularly tune in to see her colleagues work when she was on maternity leave. ` ` I saw everybody,'' she said, ` ` and I'm blubbering like a baby.''
